GSD.description:
virtio_console: eliminate anonymous module_init & module_exit

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.3 by commit 71612aee09ecea3475f8751dc841d75a011b1fd0. For more details please see the references link.
